whenToUse: Architecture Questions: Designing system architecture, integration patterns, multi-tenant solutions, or portal architecture
Integration Questions: Implementing ETL, API, or event-driven integrations, SIS synchronization, or integration platforms
Identity Questions: Implementing SSO, multi-identity provider architectures, or login handlers

Data Modeling Questions: Designing external IDs, integration keys, student lifecycle models, case management models, lead management and conversion patterns, setting up custom objects with fields, layouts, and permissions, or choosing file storage mechanisms (ContentVersion, Attachments, Documents)
Security Questions: Implementing permission set-driven security, managing access control, or securing Salesforce data for LLM systems

Development Questions: Implementing Apex, Flow, LWC, OmniStudio, error handling, logging, troubleshooting patterns, understanding order of execution, choosing between before-save and after-save automation, handling row locking and concurrency, optimizing governor limits and performance, building dynamic SOQL queries, implementing relationship queries, or performing org maintenance
Project Methods Questions: Sprint-based delivery, testing strategies, or quality standards
Troubleshooting Questions: Integration debugging, data reconciliation, or root cause analysis
Pattern Questions: Looking for reusable patterns or best practices
howToUse: Identify Domain: Determine which domain folder contains relevant knowledge

contentCharacteristics.sanitized: All identifying information removed (company names, client names, project codenames)

terminology.ETL: Extract, Transform, Load - batch data synchronization
terminology.SIS: Student Information System - external system for student data
terminology.OIDC: OpenID Connect - identity provider protocol for external users
terminology.SAML: Security Assertion Markup Language - identity provider protocol for enterprise SSO
terminology.External ID: Field marked as external ID for upsert operations
terminology.Permission Set: Salesforce mechanism for granting incremental permissions
terminology.Record Type: Salesforce mechanism for differentiating record types
terminology.OmniStudio: Salesforce OmniStudio for guided workflows and reusable UI components
terminology.LWC: Lightning Web Component - modern Salesforce UI component framework
terminology.EDA: Education Data Architecture - Salesforce Education Cloud data model
